titleStmt.title: A letter to a person of honour, concerning the kings disavovving the having been married to the D. of M's mother
titleStmt.author: Ferguson, Robert, d. 1714.

notesStmt.note: "The D. of M's mother" is Lucy Walters, mother of the Duke of Monmouth.
Written by Robert Ferguson. Cf. BM.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Dated at end: London, June the 10th, 1610 [i.e. 1680].
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
